subject: Playoff Games
Officiating (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: In the Giants’ last playoff game in San Francisco, in 2003, they gave away a 24-point lead and lost, 39-38, after a stunning — and controversial — field-goal attempt.
snippet: In the Giants’ last playoff game in San Francisco, in 2003, they gave away a 24-point lead and lost, 39-38, after a stunning — and controversial — field-goal attempt.
